info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 3 at 11:05PM EDT until May 4 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following county, Leon.
* WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1105 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida A and M, Florida State University, Tallahassee State College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Gene Cox Stadium, North Florida Fairgrounds, Jack McLean Park, Apalachee Ridge Estates, South City, Walker Ford Community Center, Gaither Community Center, Indian Head Acres, Springsax Park, Bragg Stadium, Cascades Park, All Saints District, State Capital Complex and Leon County Civic Center. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT
